extendedInfo.description: Loosely inspired by the traditional "Spin the Bottle", A World Of Photo is a fun casual, geo multiplayer online game with with a social touch.Update: Fixed Vibrate, 2.2 connection troubles, allow install on SD.

reviews.title: Ice Cream Sandwich bug
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing for over a year with no problems. I just upgraded to ICS and now the pics I take won\'t send and eventually time out. What\'s going on?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very innovative app I\'ve had for a long time. Some of its appeal is its rogue nature. It\'s no surprise that it has become overrun by deviants, but that aspect is offputting to people who would use it for sharing photos that aren\'t genitals. There are a lot of things that could be done to take this app to the next level, but it appears support has ceased.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: TBH I wished I got more pics of pretty girls preferably naked but honestly just if they were girls would be cool. Seen no penises/dude butt. Good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Love to play this right up until another dong shows up on my phone. Would be better if the players were a bit less depraved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please, please...
reviews.comment: To the talented, innovative developer of this once extraordinary application. Take these sick, twisted, depraved perverts OFF! Leave this app for those who call themselves photographers. I bet many people would buy the donated version, including myself, if this app were to be kept clean.Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is dodgy. First pic I received was male genitals. Anyone under 16 receiving that and its a criminal offence. F**ckin disgusting.

reviews.comment: I love it but would like to know if can use pics from my gallery??? Please, anyone know?

reviews.comment: Great good fun but I\'d like to be able to save pix easily and see history :) Amie call yourself so no one knows you\'re a girl!

reviews.title: Pretty good

reviews.comment: My favorite game on Android. Would be better if some people would stop being pathetic and begging for naked pics.

reviews.comment: Needs a send button. And always loses threads to people youve communicated with. But still fun

reviews.comment: Great idea! Need more social functions: people search, add to friends, choose country (not only spin).

reviews.comment: Its great if I wanna see a bunch of pervs everywhere trying to show me their junk.... lame where\'s the creativity nice concept but sickos ruin it

reviews.comment: Nice pastime! But does not work anymore, if I change the internet connection, e.g., from 3G to Wifi. (SGS2)

reviews.comment: This is one of the best games I\'ve played in a long time...The only thing I would add is an option to add a caption b4 you send the photo.

reviews.comment: Brilliant but needs work, not least a gender flag and a option to say whether or not you want to see adult content.

reviews.comment: SGS2. Good app. A lot of potential improvements could be made. Unfortunately too many guys trying to get cheap thrills wanting girls to send naked pics or sending pics of their genitals makes it no fun.
